name: ExpendiBots
description: An artificial AI for the game Expendi Bots created in for the subject AI. The goal of the project was to work in a team and create a bot to vs others and win. We trialed many different methods of constructing our bot and settle upon a Min-Max Alpha-Beta pruned search with heuristics for move ordering and quiescence search. Overall we placed in the top 8th position winning 13/14 games
